author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/), D8H
description:
Solid resource bar

Unit resource bar
name: ResourceBar
shortDescription: Displays a bar that represents a resource in the game (health, shield, mana, ammo, etc)

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Displays a solid bar that represents a resource in the game (health, shield, mana, ammo, etc)
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SolidResourceBar

events.comment: Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame
Use correct min value (instead of always starting at 0)
Set Bar height function (which enforces valid thumb sizes)
Start halo at same size as thumb
Bar where the mouse is (in relation to object)
Move slider when being dragged
End sliding and update variables
Update "Value" based on the location of the thumb
Grow halo even more when pressed
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near Bar, start dragging
Reset hover detection
Grow halo when hovered
Shrink halo to zero when not hovered
Redraw slider only when halo is not at final size
Set inactive Bar parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw inactive Bar
Draw half circle at end of Bar (inactive side)
Set active Bar parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw active Bar (2 pixels bigger than property)
Draw half circle at end of Bar (active side)
Prepare halo
Draw halo (it will grow or shrink as needed)
Use a more opaque halo while being dragged (it will grow or shrink as needed)
Prepare thumb settings
Draw Circle thumb
Draw Rectangle thumb

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the slider is being dragged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBeingDragged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the slider interations are enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEnabled

eventsFunctions.description: Enable or disable the slider. Users cannot interact while it is disabled.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnabled

events.comment: Stop dragging (so the slider won't be dragging when it gets enabled)
Reset halo size (so halo won't appear when slider gets enabled)

eventsFunctions.description: The value of the slider (based on position of the thumb).
eventsFunctions.name: Value

eventsFunctions.description: Change the value of a slider (this will move the thumb to the correct position).
eventsFunctions.name: SetValue

events.comment: Set the proper offset (it moves the slider)

eventsFunctions.description: The minimum value of a slider.
eventsFunctions.name: ValueMin

eventsFunctions.description: Change the minimum value of a slider.
eventsFunctions.name: SetValueMin

eventsFunctions.description: The maximum value of a slider.
eventsFunctions.name: ValueMax

eventsFunctions.description: Thickness of Bar.
eventsFunctions.name: BarThickness

eventsFunctions.description: Length of Bar.
eventsFunctions.name: BarLength

eventsFunctions.description: Height of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: ThumbHeight

eventsFunctions.description: Change the maximum value of a slider.
eventsFunctions.name: SetValueMax

eventsFunctions.description: The tick spacing of a slider.
eventsFunctions.name: TickSpacing

eventsFunctions.description: Change the tick spacing of a slider.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTickSpacing

eventsFunctions.description: Change length of Bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBarLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change Bar length of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

events.comment: Move thumb to correct place (based on new Bar size)

eventsFunctions.description: Change thickness of Bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBarThickness
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change Bar thickness of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

events.comment: Make sure thumb width is not smaller than Bar height + 2 pixels (to prevent Bar ends from showing)

eventsFunctions.description: Change width of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbWidth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change thumb width of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

events.comment: Thumb cannot be less than Bar thickness (plus 2 pixels)

eventsFunctions.description: Change height of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbHeight
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change thumb height of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

events.comment: Thumb cannot be less than Bar thickness (plus 2 pixels)

eventsFunctions.description: Change radius of the halo around the thumb.  This size is also used to detect interaction with the slider.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloRadius
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change halo radius of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change the halo opacity when the thumb is hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloOpacityHover
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the halo opacity when hovered of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of halo when pressed.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHaloOpacityPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change halo opacity when pressed of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

eventsFunctions.description: Change shape of thumb (circle or rectangle).
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShape

events.comment: Make sure thumb width is not smaller than Bar height (to prevent Bar ends from showing)

eventsFunctions.description: Make Bar use rounded ends.
eventsFunctions.name: SetRoundedBar

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbOpacity

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of inactive Bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveBarOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change inactive Bar opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of active Bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveBarOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change active Bar opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the Bar that is LEFT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveBarColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change active Bar color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the Bar that is RIGHT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveBarColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change inactive Bar color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the thumb color to a specific value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbColor

eventsFunctions.description: Update the hitbox.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateHitbox

propertyDescriptors.label: Inactive Bar color (thumb color by default)
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveBarColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Active Bar color (thumb color by default)
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveBarColor

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Displays a line of objects that represent a resource in the game (hearts, lives, ammo, etc).  
Use the same image used for resource bar and unit objects.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: UnitResourceBar

eventsFunctions.description: Draw a unit resource bar.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawUnitBar

events.comment: Delete all units higher than max unit value
Only apply color if it has change from default value

parameters.description: Object used to display each unit
parameters.name: UnitObject

eventsFunctions.description: Apply color tint to empty units. Empty units exist between the current and maximum value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEmptyUnitColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Apply color tint _PARAM2_ to empty units of _PARAM0_

parameters.longDescription: Use "white" to remove all color tint
parameters.name: ColorTint

eventsFunctions.description: Hide empty units. Empty units exist between the current and maximum value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHideEmptyUnits

eventsFunctions.description: Change maximum units that can be displayed.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxUnits

eventsFunctions.description: Change the current quantity of units.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCurrentUnits
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the unit quantity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: Hide empty units
propertyDescriptors.description: Empty units exist between the current and maximum value.
propertyDescriptors.name: HideEmptyUnits

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Draw a resource bar that represents health, shield, or any value.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DrawResourceBar117

events.comment: Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame
Use correct min value (instead of always starting at 0)
Set inactive Bar parameters (by default, use the active bar color)
Draw inactive Bar
Draw half circle at end of Bar (inactive side)
Set active Bar parameters
Draw active bar
Draw half circle at end of bar (active side)

eventsFunctions.name: SetValueMax

eventsFunctions.name: TickSpacing

eventsFunctions.description: Change the tick spacing of a resource bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetTickSpacing

eventsFunctions.description: Change length of a resource bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBarLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change bar length of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

events.comment: Move thumb to correct place (based on new Bar size)

eventsFunctions.description: Change thickness of a resource bar
eventsFunctions.name: SetBarThickness
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the bar thickness of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ px

events.comment: Make sure thumb width is not smaller than Bar height + 2 pixels (to prevent Bar ends from showing)

eventsFunctions.description: Make bar use rounded ends.
eventsFunctions.name: SetRoundedBar

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of inactive bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveBarOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change inactive bar opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change opacity of active bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveBarOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change active bar opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the left side of the bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveBarColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change active bar color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the right side of the resource bar.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveBarColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change inactive bar color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Update the hitbox.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateHitbox

eventsFunctions.description: Draw health bar.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawHealthBar
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw health bar with _PARAM0_ based on health of _PARAM2_

events.comment: Set values

events.comment: Set values

eventsFunctions.description: Draw resource bar.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawResourceBar
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw resource bar with _PARAM0_ with current value _PARAM2_ and max value _PARAM3_

events.comment: Set values

propertyDescriptors.label: Time to complete moving the bar when the value is changed (seconds)
propertyDescriptors.name: ChangeDuration
